game.name: Rivais Em Batalha
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Jogue com os mascotes de Atlético MG e Cruzeiro neste jogo multiplayer de tiro em terceira pessoa!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as an animal warrior and experience the feeling of playing in a sci-fi environment with weapons and different characters and fun audio in a nice third-person gameplay.
